InBody in Bogotá: When You Need to Know, Not Guess

At Dr. Tatiana Leal’s medical center, we use the InBody 770, the most advanced body analyzer available in Colombia. This medical-grade technology lets you know exactly what’s happening in your body, beyond what the scale shows.

InBody: The Truth About Your Body

The InBody analysis goes beyond the traditional scale, revealing your true body composition with medical precision. Find out why weight isn’t everything.

  • Analysis of hidden visceral fat
  • Fluid retention monitoring

Invest in Knowing Your Body

The InBody analysis is the first step to transforming your body intelligently. The investment includes not only the precise measurement but also the professional interpretation of your results and a personalized plan based on real data.

During your consultation, we will analyze your results in detail and design an action plan specific to your goals. We will also explain the options for periodic follow-up to track your progress.

The InBody Experience with Dr. Tatiana Leal

Your analysis begins with a consultation where we listen to your goals and concerns. The measurement procedure takes only 60 seconds, and you get detailed results instantly. We analyze each metric with you, explaining its meaning and how it impacts your personalized plan.

No special preparation is needed except avoiding heavy meals 2 hours before. It’s completely painless and non-invasive, allowing you to resume your activities right away.
